main event: An observer in Lebanon, Ohio reported seeing a very fast moving red light on July 3, 1965.
interesting points: The object was noted to change intensity from very bright to dim.,The observer described the light as having a metallic shine and making no sound.,Before disappearing near the horizon, the object seemed to split into two parts and then rejoin.,The sighting lasted about 10 seconds.,The evaluation of the sighting considered it characteristic of a high flying aircraft.
sighted object: a fast moving red light in the sky
